field.name: summary
field.value: JQueryHelper cannot be used without its default ctor

field.name: description
field.value:
JQueryHelper needs the default parameterless constructor to be used. Currently when added to the controller with [Helper(typeof(JQueryHelper), "JQuery")] it produces an "No parameterless constructor defined for this object."
I have added locally the ctor, built the project and updated my references and it works.
I think this is the cause for which $JQuery.InstallScripts() doesn't render the scripts but only the text "$JQuery.InstallScripts()"

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''2.1''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Work Started'' to ''Resolved''.
